p: NMR (nuclear magnetic resonance, as 13C-NMR, 1H-NMR) spectra were recorded on an Avance III spectrometer (Bruker) operating at 400.20 MHz for 1H and 100.63 MHz for 13C. Solvents for the extraction and column chromatography (CC) were of technical grade and redistilled before use. Silica gel for CC (70–230 mesh) and precoated silica gel F254 (20 × 20 cm) plates for TLC, both supplied by the Merck were used. Deuterated solvents (100 atom %D) were from Armar Chemicals. TLC plates were visualized under UV light (254 and 366 nm) and by spraying with 0.5% anisaldehyde in MeOH, followed by heating at 150 °C.
